Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that the photographed object is a Bible found at the bottom of the ocean.

Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photographed object is not a Bible and was not found at the bottom of the ocean, as it was part of a crystallization experiment.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the photographed object, stating that it is a German-English dictionary used in a crystallization experiment described in a 2014 blog post.
